pages.text: $(li)Hushes are the Desert variant of the $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/zombie)Zombies$(/l) that can be found on $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/desert/desert)Deserts$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/desert/dunes)Dunes$(/l) when the night arrives or in places with low lighting.$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/rotten_flesh)Rotten Flesh$(/l) upon death.$(br)$(li)They are not affected by the sunlight.
